posts.title: Posts
posts.article: Today I did posts rendering from database. Features far away from ideal, but it is working and I can already do posts

posts.title: To do list
posts.article: Today i did to do list. It's already works, but I have work there. I have to style that and make local storage saves

posts.title: Plans
posts.article: Today I finished to do list. It doesn't have much features, but I'm not going to improve it. Right now I want create project for improving my server-connection skills

posts.title: Connect Four
posts.article: Making Connect Four Game so interesting, I really enjoy it. Now I think how i can create chips from array, for make easily clean field if future. In general this game not easy task for me, but i think i can do it

posts.title: Connect Four Finished
posts.article: Connect Four was done couple days ago. I tried structure it with modules, but I can't. Problem is I call functions from each other and I don't know how apart them. Next time I will think about it on the start of the project

posts.title: Slider for posts
posts.article: Today I made slider for posts. It wasn'n hard, I did it before, but this time I have to call function asynchronously. Little practice, I should make project with more asynchronous code

posts.title: REST API Countries project
posts.article: I made project wich takes API and show you information about country. Also I med a webpack structure in this project. It was pretty fun

posts.title: Github Pages
posts.article: Today I put my To Do List in Github pages. Fist time my work somewhere in the Internet. Next step I will make a sending message from the form in my website and put it on pages too. Also I want remake my markup projects

posts.title: React
posts.article: I throw all my projectsto the Github pages and now I can show it to someone. Also I started to learn React. It is hard a little because i didn't have a lot practice with classes, but I can do it

posts.title: Pomodoro
posts.article: I started my first React project. It is pomodoro timer. I still confuse props and states and it is hard to choose should I use class in the component or I shouldn't, but I can handle it. I will be developer soon

posts.title: Pomodoro sequel
posts.article: Today I made main logic for pomodoro. I don't like code, it is ugly. But it's working. I should refactor this shit before show it someone. At least my methods should make only 1 move. And I should think about naming

posts.title: Pomodoro final
posts.article: Today I finished pomodoro. I had to rewrite almost all code, but now it doesn't look too bad. I also placed this project on Github Pages. While making pomodoro I found it is time for 'Clean code'. I must improve my code

posts.title: Redux
posts.article: Learning Redux. Creating project from course. Nothing interesting yet
